full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 PARENTS PACKAGE Page 1 of 2 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT I, Joginder S. Uppal, residing at 1900 South Westnedge Avenue, Kalamazoo, Michigan 49008, U.S.A., being duly sworn depose and say: 1. That I am 45 years of age and have resided in the United States of America since August, 1969. 2. That I am a naturalized United States citizen. I was natural- ized on February 9, 1982, in the Ceremonial Court, Room 19415, U.S. Courthouse, San Francisco, California. My naturalization certificate number is 11614770. 3. (a) That I am willing and able to receive, maintain and support my father, Dhian Singh Uppal and my mother, Sant Kaur Uppal. I will furnish them room, board, clothing, and all other necessary expenses in this country. (b) That I am ready and willing to deposit a bond, if necessary, with the Immigration and Naturalization Service to guarantee that my father, Dhian Singh Uppal and my mother, Sant Kaur Uppal, will not become a public charge in the United States. 4. That this affidavit is made by me for the purpose of assuring the United States Government that the applicants will not become public charges in the United States. 5. That my reasons for signing this affidavit are: (a) Assuring the INS that the applicants will not become public liability. (b) I want to help my father and mother to come and stay with me and my family permanently in the United States. 6. That I have made arrangements for them to stay with me in my home in Kalamazoo. 7. (a) That my salary is $2,500 per month. I and my family also enjoy free lodging with paid utilities and would amount to approximately $1,200 per month. (b) That I have on deposit in bank of this country, $12,539.28 (c) That I have life insurance in the sum of $200,000.00. (d) That my wife (Harbhajan Uppal) has life insurance in the sum of $100,000.00. (e) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $26,000.00. (f) That I own real estate in West Sacramento County of Yolo (Parcel No. 45-280-03) valued at $25,000.00, with no mortgages or other encumbrances there on.
